item.title: pyqt toolbar
item.author: rinetd@163.com (rinetd)
item.description: super(QToolBar, self).setFixedHeight(value) https://github.com/tpoveda/tpQtLib/blob/da4baa56b457061bcd17fd52a4a66b64d672c035/source/tpQtLib/widgets/toolbar.py 修改toolbar的显示区域 self.addToolBar(Qt.TopToolBarArea, toolbar) 修改toolbar的大小 toolBar.setFixedHeight(36); - works well. But if I set icon size after this: toolBar->setFixedHeight(36); toolBar->setIconSize(QSize(10, 10)); height breaks down. Also it happens if I set icon size via stylesheet. Changing of calls order helps: toolBar->setIconSize(QSize(10, 10)); toolBar->setFixedHeight(36); super(QToolBar, self).setFixedHeight(value) def
